name: Aspire Software Consultancy
description:
Aspire Software Consultancy is a Software Outsourcing & Offshore Software Development Company specializing in the business of providing services to its clients globally for all kind of custom software development and maintenance services since 10+ years.
Our technology expertise includes:
Microsoft .net stack development [web/desktop applications]
CRM customization and custom development [Salesforce.com and MS Dynamics]
Cloud Platforms  [MS Azure,AWS]
Native and Hybrid  mobile Apps development [Android/IOS]
Java/J2EE, PHP/My SQL,RoR
C/C++/VC++
ReactJs,Node.js, Angular.js, Knockout.js, Backbone.js, Sencha, BootStrap and low level programming.
QA/Test Automation
What makes us special?
Strong web and mobility expertise with highly experienced team in web, cloud, and mobile technologies.
Experience in architecting and engineering large consumer sites, apps, and software.
We work on flexible engagements models which are client focused to deliver value to them.
Expert in product development
We are proud member of NASSCOM
Membership ID: NSCM/2015/11/3892
Silicon India listed Aspire Software Consultancy among the 25 Most Promising Global Outsourcing Companies.
